Detailed Description

Class for checking the size and position of DataBuffers.

Uses MC2_ASSERT and shouldn't do much in release version. E.g. in a save-function in an object: <br /> int MyObject::save(DataBuffer& buf) const <br /> { <br /> DataBufferChecker dbc(buf, "MyObject::save"); <br /> dbc.assertRoom(getSizeInDataBuffer() <br /> buf.writeNextLong(...); <br /> ... <br /> // All done, check that getSizeInDataBuffer works <br /> dbc.assertPosition(getSizeInDataBuffer()); <br /> return getSizeInDataBuffer(); <br /> }<br />
